name: Pop My Grape
description:
A simple delicious and authentic bubble gum recipe made to show off just how easy the Molinberry American Bubblegum is to use. Just like the the familiar ones you may have had but only better I think. Give it a try and tell us what you think ! 
Take a listen to our short Podcast about this here: https://www.diydownunder.com/podcasts
author: DIYDownunderPippa

reviews.text: Holy crap this is authentic its like a fresh peice of grap gum in my mouth.
100% tastes like Purple Bubble Gum, except I can't swallow this kind or blow bubbles.  Excellent!
